author: bharath.vedartham
content: With ePBS, the beacon block would not have the full execution payload attached to it but only the bid. I am curious how the beacon-api to get the beacon block would change with this. I assume the API to get the beacon block would just return the beacon block with the execution payload bid and we have a separate api to return the execution payload envelope?

author: stefanbratanov
content: Yes, there would be a separate API to get the payload, there is a PR for these changes https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/552

author: bharath.vedartham
content: ahh awesome! thanks for pointing me to this!
